product_name: Tiger Tail USA Muscle Massager - 18 in.
long_description: The Tiger Tail USA 18 in. Muscle Massager helps alleviate knots and soreness in your muscles. Flexible center rod is surrounded by foam that rolls over your muscles; foam rubber handles provide secure grip. Can be used for trigger point therapy and myofascial release.
short_description: The Tiger Tail USA 18 in. Muscle Massager helps alleviate knots and soreness in your muscles.
